thread.title: FlipHTML5 Added New Features to Its Popular Digital Publisher for Mac
thread.title_full: FlipHTML5 Added New Features to Its Popular Digital Publisher for Mac

author: prbuzz.com
title: FlipHTML5 Added New Features to Its Popular Digital Publisher for Mac
text:
The world’s leading provider of digital software development and publisher for Mac FLIPHTML5 announces the release of its newest feature. The latest eBook publisher for Mac users is available online with v1.2.13. This software can be used directly online, also the desktop client can be installed on Mac computers. This feature has been made possible due to the company’s consistent upgrading of its software with more enhanced and superior features. The company now it as a perfect digital publishing tool for Mac users again this fall.
FlipHTML5 has catered to a number of satisfied customers; here are some reviews from customers about the awesomeness of this publisher for Mac. Brian Williams, an Online Publisher says ‘’FlipHTML5 will be one of the most popular publishing platforms in the future. I have never imagined the HTML5 publishing technology can be so powerful! However, the FlipHTML5 team achieves it. Choose FlipHTML5 meet the bloom of the mobile internet”. Another satisfied client Marcus Johnson a webmaster has this to say about FLIPHTML5 “I am always looking for a better solution to present my digital magazine to the readers of my website. The HTML5 flipping solution helps me create interactive digital magazines for all platforms easily. Thanks a lot!”
FlipHTML5 has created Amazing upgrades in this new feature which includes:
· One can create new pages successfully.
· The thumbnails can display correctly.
· One can add MP4 into page flipping EBook successfully.
· Page editor allows editing of sizes or other properties of added images.
About FLIPHTML5: FlipHTML5 software company LTD is a world leading provider of digital software offering outstanding range of E-publishing software for users around the world. FlipHTML5 has kept abreast with the changes in technology publishing industries over the years to provide its users with the best quality services in the market. For more information’s about this publisher for Mac go to http://fliphtml5.com/ .
